briefTitle: Safety and Effectiveness Study of the Ensure Medical Vascular Closure Device
officialTitle: ECLIPSE Trial - Ensure's Vascular Closure Device Speeds Hemostasis Trial
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the Ensure Medical Vascular Closure Device is more effective than standard manual compression at sealing the puncture made in the femoral artery following a cardiac or peripheral diagnostic or interventional procedure while maintaining the same level of safety.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From when the introducer sheath was removed to the time hemostasis was first observed

commonTop: Access Site-Related Bleeding Requiring > 30 min for Hemostasis
